title: President Ghani attends Ashura commemoration (Office of the President of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan) ...
text: ( Source : Office of the President of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan ) Mohammad Ashraf Ghani , President of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan, attended Ashura ceremony this morning in Hussainia Nabi Akram mosque, in Kabul city. In his
